tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Two stories about a man and a woman, each looking for their birth mother. Our second story is on behalf of a man longing to find his birth mother after more than fifty years apart.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Jane Edmanson plants a bed for summer cut flowers, Millie Ross meets a woman devoted to saving an endangered plant, Costa Georgiadis visits an unusual farm in Byron Bay, and Josh Byrne explores hectares of hidden tulips.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across today. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: The Forsytes
programme.desc: Chance encounters for cousins Jolyon and Soames Forsyte, rival heirs to the family firm, throw their previously steady lives into disarray.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Richard Rowles plans to live with climate change, by building a flood proof house on the banks of the volatile Brisbane River.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret is forced to confront his past when a politically connected billionaire demands his help.

programme.title: Spicks And Specks
programme.desc: Gardening Australias Costa Georgiadis joins for a fun new game and there to help spread the lawn fertiliser are Robert Forster, Julia Morris, Ruva Ngwenya and Brett Blake. Plus Pseudo Echo takes us back to Funky Town.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: A train crash and a man cut in half expose deep rifts on a country estate.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret is forced to confront his past when a politically connected billionaire demands his help.

programme.title: I Was Actually There
programme.sub-title: Sydney To Hobart Yacht Race Tragedy
programme.desc: The 1998 Sydney to Hobart race was a moment when nature asserted its dominance with terrifying force. Six lives were lost, five yachts sank and hundreds of sailors were pulled into a brutal fight for survival. (Final)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: DCI Vera Stanhope investigates the mysterious death of a young man whose remains are discovered in remote caves in an area notorious for illicit teenage gatherings.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Buttercup spends time with a group of bad-girl skaters.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Thinking its a cat, Bridgette befriends, and sneaks a skunk into the daycare.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Herman the mantis shrimp is in the lab to help the doctors explain how your incredible body not only makes crystals in your bones and teeth, but also stops them from doing damage in your kidneys.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: When Monarch senses a unique occasion to get a real second chance, he is ready to do anything, even if it means that this could be his last chance to seize the Miraculous.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The farm is looking spotless and everyone is on their best behaviour when the dreaded farm inspector pays a visit.

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: Kai teams up with Ace to protect the Jedi temple.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Competing in this round is Foxic, Expulsion, Heavy Metal, M.R. Speed Squared, Thor, Tauron, Chimera 2 and Concussion. After two group battles, four teams progress into a mini league going head-to-head in a bid for points.

programme.title: Officially Amazing
programme.desc: Meet the worlds Largest Air Drumming Ensemble, dive into the Largest Sick Bag Collection and admire the worlds longest tongue. Ben meets a fitness fanatic who puts him through his paces. And Haruka takes us on a record-breaking tour of Tokyo.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: A Full-throttle Battle! The Vengeful Golden Frieza
programme.desc: Not to be outdone by Gokus new form, Frieza reveals a new one of his own. Once again the two face off in an evenly matched battle. Meanwhile, Beerus and Whis make their way to Earth but run into allies of their own.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Blossom and Buttercup lose Bubbles overnight.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from new releases to classics and the long-forgotten.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Comedian and childrens author Rosie Jones is here to help Rattus choose his World Book Day outfit, and discover the gory details behind some favourite childrens books!

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Peculiar Pop Quiz
programme.desc: Maudie and Ava infiltrate Mr Barkers grade six class to watch his famous pop quiz, where Maudie uncovers a crime.

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: Kai tries to help Nash with deliveries.

programme.title: Hard Quiz Kids
programme.sub-title: Dolphins, Jasprit Bumrah, The Titanic and Pluto
programme.desc: Chasing after Tom Gleesons Big Brass Mug this week are Veda with dolphins, Viyona with cricket legend Jasprit Bumrah, Tyler with the Titanic and Hrishi with Pluto!

programme.title: Abbott Elementary
programme.desc: The teachers are back at Willard R. Abbott Public School for development week.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: A Chance Appears In A Tight Spot! Launch A Counteroffensive, Goku!
programme.desc: Goku is having trouble facing Golden Frieza until he realises the other is quickly losing stamina. Gaining the upper hand, Goku gives Frieza a chance to leave Earth for good.

programme.title: BTN High
programme.desc: The social media ban wont prevent teens from using YouTube, as long as theyre not logged into an account. But experts warn browsing the site this way could increase the risk of teens being exposed to dangerous content.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: Breakneck comedy show packed with stand-up routines from top comics, brought to life in sketch form. Featuring Luke Kempner, Sikisa, Finlay Christie and Ian Smith.

programme.title: Heartbreak High
programme.desc: Charlie is worried when he notices that Anita is eating very little and vomiting after every meal. Reluctantly, he takes the problem to Hilary and the two decide to take action.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: Uncover Blacks Identity! Off To The 10th Universes World Of The Kais
programme.desc: The nature of Blacks power remains a mystery, so Whis, Beerus, and Goku go to the 10th Universe to find answers. Will challenging an apprentice Supreme Kai really help with the investigation? Goku seems to think so.

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.desc: A motley crew of villains storm into Odd Squad headquarters, but cant agree on a plan of attack.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: When a hipster grocery store clerk shames the Bears for asking for plastic grocery bags, they realize that ecofriendly tote bags are their way of gaining acceptance among the progressive people of the Bay Area.

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: Robby, Mo, and the Terrans are invited to play Witwickys new Escape Room game. Twitch loves to win, so shes eager to help her team succeed - but the game is much more than meets the eye...

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: B, O and X discover a box filled with everything they need to put on a performance of Sleeping Beauty. This episode has fun with lots of letters - and the words box, hag, red, ted and bed.

programme.title: Art Blast
programme.desc: Sheep, cows and... lasers? Hapless Rich attempts to peacefully rest his eyes on paintings of the pastoral countryside. But Matt has other ideas.

programme.title: Bitesize Daily
programme.desc: Learn about one point perspective, cityscapes and adding colour.

programme.title: Move It Mob Style
programme.desc: Ryka Satrick and soul sister Elizabeth Timbery share their smoothest moves to The Last Kinections Boolaraman and to the beats of JPoints Get Wrecked. Darren Compton and Elena Wangarra are cooler than cool.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: One dad embarks on an incredible adventure as he converts a freefall lifeboat into a yellow submarine camping pod in honour of his late father, and three daughters and a mum create a straw bale house oozing with rustic charm.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Aisha Tyler hosts another fun packed episode featuring regulars Wayne Brady, Ryan Stiles and Colin Mochrie along with guest performer Greg Proops and star guest comedian and host of Talking Dead, Chris Hardwick.

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: Its planes, trains and propeller mobiles... Adam and Jamie tackle the mystery of the shredded plane.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Phil finds himself on a secret agent mission in Fixby near Huddersfield, West Yorkshire where retiree Jean desperately needs help to shift her home, which has been on the market for 13 months.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Navy SEAL sniper Chris Kyles pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives and turns him into a legend. Back home to his wife and kids after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he cant leave behind.

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: Bens poker school is costing him a fortune, while Susans visit to her fortune teller reveals that something far more deadly is on the cards. Meanwhile, Abi and Roger have to seek advice from Susan, as Roger has no friends.

programme.title: Penn And Teller: Fool Us
programme.sub-title: The Most Shocking and Bizarre Magic Trick Ever
programme.desc: Featured magicians include Shock and Bizzare, Alexander Krist, Jo De Rijck and Gotaishi.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors find out what happens when you eat with the help of a miniature Xand doll, test your ears and eyes in a baffling mind-bending trick, and join Dr Chris at work fighting infectious diseases.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: He Who Is Of Saiyan Blood Trunks Resolve
programme.desc: The time machine repairs are finishing up. Vegeta and Future Trunks go training, but the extent of Vegetas power is unlike anything Future Trunks has ever seen.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania: The Series
programme.desc: Mavis dreams are haunted by a familiar undead face. Shes losing sleep and it could cost her dearly at the big Bludgeons and Dragons tournament.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Amato and friends stay late after school to finish a project, but they soon realize that they are not alone.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Benton decides to blow the whistle on Vucelichs unethical study methods. Dougs birthday includes a surprise visit from his prodigal father. Carter spreads rumours about an affair between Mark and Susan.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: After 15 viewings and not a hint of an offer on their home in West Sussex, retirees Tim and Gina want to upsize. Can Phil help turn their dark and cluttered 1950s house into an up-to-date, desirable residence?

programme.title: Live At The Apollo
programme.desc: This episode of the award-winning Live at the Apollo is hosted by the brilliant Ed Gamble who introduces comedians Tom Davis and Judi Love to the stage.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: After having their faces washed by Makka Pakka, the Pontipines go to meet the Wottingers.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: Detective Ziggy investigates who is eating the cafe food in the middle of the night. He is determined to solve the case of the Midnight Muncher.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Daniel is so excited about his Show and Tell at school that he forgets his lunchbox at home. So this doesnt happen again, Daniel says his checklist out loud.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Its bedtime but wheres Hoppity? Bing remembers playing with him in the garden but now its all dark out there and he doesnt really like the dark.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppas French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to the playgroup where they teach her the Bing Bong Song.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Bitzer treats the farmer to a restaurant style dining experience, offering a delicious pie as the main course.

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes
programme.desc: Feeling left out with the arrival of new heroes on the team, Gekko tries to muscle his way into missions that dont involve him - overlooking a threat only he could prevent.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The children have adopted a new pet: a dragon named Dave.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family find a bird on the ground and take it to the vet.

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Fossilised honeysuckle is extremely yummy and extremely difficult to crack open. Ginger and the baby Pea-rexes must use all their clever thinking to open their prized meal.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Big Lizard isnt happy in his skin! Cosima tries everything to stop him scratching until she realises thats exactly what he needs to do. Hes shedding his skin!

programme.title: Play School: Big Teds Time Machine
programme.desc: Kaeng and Luke time travel into the future and find lots of gadgets and gizmos. They see flying cars and use the Zapizoover 5000! Theyre joined by guest, Kirli Saunders to plant native seeds for future generations to enjoy!

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: The Dream Factory Crew turn a pile of boxes into an amazing pretend-play medieval castle, but when Biff and Tiff lay siege, Moose and Fluffles wind up in peril from a modern-day "dragon."

programme.title: Nikhil and Jay
programme.sub-title: Nikhil and Jay and the Star Birthday
programme.desc: When Nikhil and Jay hear Amma and Appa talking about a Star Birthday they try to find out what it is. Through misunderstanding they make it a Star Birthday to remember!

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector visits a town. Its exciting, maybe even too much sound!

programme.title: Bananas In Pyjamas
programme.desc: The Cuddlestown Band sounds great except for one small thing - none of the musicians can play in time together!

programme.title: Wiggle And Learn
programme.desc: Join Dorothy the Dinosaur and The Wiggles as they go through the steps before a good nights rest! There are healthy habits to build, and a bedtime story to read, its a perfect bedtime routine.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Its Captain Daddy Dogs birthday and Mummy Dog surprises him with the gift of a boat trip, which isnt quite what he expected.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When a meteorite splashes into the sea Dad and Cosima cause problems by claiming it in the name of science, against the wishes of all the sea creatures.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Vidas patients arent sick, but they cant stop sneezing! Can she figure out why?

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Cone Snail
programme.desc: Only Peso can save the day when a cone snail invades the Octopod and tranquilises the crew one by one with its dangerous venom-filled harpoons.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: While avoiding Catboy who wants to outspeed these new villains, the PJ Masks heroes unlock new animal companions to battle with and save the day.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Sonny is trying to prove himself to be a useful engine so that he can stay working on Sodor, but nobody seems to trust him... nobody apart from Diesel, that is! But can Diesel be trusted?

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Costa and the junior gardeners brew up a special snack for the garden, compost!

programme.title: Wiggle And Learn
programme.desc: Its time to Wiggle and Learn! Join The Wiggles as they embark on a journey to explore and discover more about planes. Then, its time to look in the dress-up box and create a pretend aeroplane.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Volcanic smoke blocks the three Proximan suns and cause Big Lizard to become worryingly cold. Cosimas on the case and comes up with a super-hot solution!

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: When Reef and Roadie are rejected from the cadets safety film, they disrupt the production with a set of pranks, but end up learning a valuable lesson about pretending to be in trouble when youre not.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Luna Girl wants to get back at Motsuki and get to the moon; by badness and deviousness.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: Its the Windsor Gardens Parade and Paddington has to lead it when Ms. Potts gets injured. Can Simi help him find the beat?

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Lucy and her dad are having a quiet, relaxing day boating on the lake. They fish out an old glittery mirror from the bottom of the lake and decide to keep it. Unfortunately the mirror belongs to a mermaid who needs it back.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Hannah takes the kids to Kimbriki Tip to find some items suitable for making a garden out of refuse. They make a flower bed from an old pram, some oars and a wheelbarrow.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: Upsy Daisy and Igglepiggle are going for a walk in the garden. It is a very windy day.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: Ziggy loves music and is sure that if he had the right instrument he would be a fantastic player. He orders several musical instrument in the mail, but all of his friends seem to be able to play them better than he can.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.desc: When joining Mum Tiger for a picnic at the playground, Daniel gets distracted playing instead of sitting down for lunch. Mum and Dad Tiger remind Daniel that meals are a special time to spend together.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula have a lovely time in the park clambering around on the trees. At first its Sula who needs Bings help to climb up but when Bing climbs a bit too high he gets stuck and then he needs some help himself.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George go with Mummy Pig to Miss Rabbits Mummies Fire Engine Service.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Bitzers over-officious management style becomes too much for the sheep who decide its time for him to chill out. Bitzers tasks for the day takes on a new purpose, for everyone to have some fun!

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. Its a bigger job than first expected, but with King and Queen Marigolds coming around, theres not much time to get it looking tip-top.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Ariel helps Ravi at work. Ariel preps Ayanna for picture day.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.sub-title: Bumpy And The Wise Old Wolfhound
programme.desc: Bingo is sick in hospital, so Bluey and Dad send her a homemade video to lift her spirits. It tells the tale of Barnicus quest to heal her spotty dog named Bumpy.

programme.title: Knee High Spies
programme.desc: The team are on a madcap midnight mission to stop Silver Paw and Pranksy stealing Lauchies tooth before the tooth fairy arrives.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: The Zee Mobile can count chickens at the farm, but needs the Mecha Builders to step in when it wont stop crashing into MacBarms barn door.

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes: Heroes Of Space
programme.desc: Newton feels unappreciated by his friends and decides to head off and explore solo but falls into the clutches of Gloop III.

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: Leo and Jimi are locked in detention and will miss their gig - can the band bust them out?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Cosima and Big Lizard are helping Dad train for his astronaut fitness test. When Rex gets in to trouble Dads hard work finally pays off.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Prickly insists he "doesnt like" ice skating. Vida gives him vet care AND sage advice.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Humpback Whales
programme.desc: When a sardine swallows the key to a treasure chest, a humpback whale helps Kwazii track it down.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Romeo challenges Carly and Cartoka to a race, but its all part of a sneaky plan to steal speed crystals.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas helps Ruth fix up an old windmill into her new, energy-efficient workshop.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Costa and the junior gardeners get "buzzy" making hotels for native bees in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is Molly Moles first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

programme.title: Wilfrid Gordon Mcdonald Partridge
programme.desc: When 6-year-old Wilfrid discovers his 96-year-old best friend Nancy has lost her memory, he embarks on a heartwarming quest to help her remember. Based on the classic childrens book by Mem Fox.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts try to answer a wetas call for help, but they cant find the right one! Turns out there are many different species of weta in New Zealand, so they have to do some detective work to find their target.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad and his mates hit the backyard, ready to rip up some tree stumps! But when BlueyÂ and Bingo take overÂ a stump asÂ aÂ nail salon, Dad finds hes got some negotiating to do.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee blows up some balloons for Tino the artistic mouses birthday, but the squirrels are worried because Tino can be grumpy.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: A fitness device craze leads the Piris to compete for points with a most unlikely winner.

programme.desc: Two stories about a man and a woman, each looking for their birth mother. Our second story is on behalf of a man longing to find his birth mother after more than fifty years apart.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Know the latest on the days top stories, as Craig Smart brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the latest on todays news, covering whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart in Perth.

programme.title: Landline
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: The Business
programme.desc: Australias leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and businesses big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: Landline

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across today. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: ABC News Day
programme.desc: As every story unfolds, catch each breaking moment and stay up to date. Ruby Cornish brings you the latest news, interviews, analysis and original reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing
programme.desc: Anthony Albanese attends the G20 Leaders Summit in Johannesburg. The NSW Liberal Party are looking for a new leader after Mark Speakman stood down. Patricia Karvelas has the latest in politics, national and global affairs.

programme.title: ABC News Hour
programme.desc: Stay in the know with Australias trusted news source. From your neighbourhood, across the country and around the world, ABC News bring you the days top stories and latest news, all verified. Presented by Joe OBrien.

programme.title: ABC Evening News
programme.desc: When you need to know whats going on across the country and around the globe, turn to Joe OBrien for a comprehensive roundup of the days news plus original reporting on the issues that affect you.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: Manny Tsigas brings you the latest headlines and a brief summary of the days top stories from ABC News.

programme.title: Close Of Business
programme.desc: Alicia Barry presents a weekly roundup of business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and overseas markets, analysing whats going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: Asia News Week
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus whats trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan, James Glenday, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy, Charles Brice and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who appeared on News Breakfast. Plus film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Chas and John look at whats not likely to be released in the Epstein files and Epsteins links to Israel, plus the latest polls not looking good for Trump, and the Republican redistricting plan for Texas has backfired.

programme.title: Close Of Business
programme.desc: Alicia Barry presents a weekly roundup of business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and overseas markets, analysing whats going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: DW Focus On Europe
programme.desc: What would it mean for Germany if Syrians were to return to their country now that the war is over? Plus in Spain, how Angela Mendoza is making a lucrative business out of evictions.

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: BBC backlash: As the BBC grapples with its Trump-editing scandal, the spotlight has also swung onto the ABC. But is the criticism fair?

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: Start your morning with the latest headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories and the overnight news from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan, James Glenday, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy, Charles Brice and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who appeared on News Breakfast. Plus film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: Jim Maxwells Ashes Memories
programme.sub-title: 1972 - A Bob Massie Masterclass at Lords
programme.desc: Jim Maxwell and Corbin Middlemas look back at some of the moments that have defined the Ashes rivalry. Part two follows Jim to Lords in 1972 where he watched from the stands as Bob Massie put on a bowling clinic.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: ABC Evening News
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australias best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: Mariam Saab brings you the latest headlines and a brief summary of the days top stories from ABC News.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and todays stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend
programme.desc: When you need to know whats happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you the days events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the days top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of whats happening as it unfolds.
